医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的治疗方法有望逆转乳腺癌的激素抵抗路易斯安那州立大学健康新奥尔良医学院、罗切斯特大学和总部位于瑞士巴塞尔的生物制药公司 Cellestia Biotech AG 之间的一项合作研究提供了令人信服的证据，表明将研究性口服药物与标准护理药物相结合可以恢复激素抵抗，分别提高雌激素受体阳性 (ER+) 和三阴性乳腺癌 (TNBC) 实验模型中的 Rx 有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/New-treatment-approach-shows-promise-in-reversing-hormone-resistance-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/New-treatment-approach-shows-promise-in-reversing-hormone-resistance-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d15f462f-8228-4178-b81e-118727244255 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 14:07:09 -0400 New treatment approach shows promise in reversing hormone resistance in breast cancer
研究发现饮酒与乳腺癌复发或死亡之间没有联系凯撒医疗机构的一项研究提供了新信息，可以帮助肿瘤学家回答他们从乳腺癌幸存者那里听到的最常见问题之一：饮酒安全吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Study-finds-no-link- Between-alcohol-use-and-breast-cancer-recurrence-or-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Study-finds-no-link- Between-alcohol-use-and-breast-cancer-recurrence-or-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c4cfddf-b1cf-466c-96fd-eb416cd9b7bc Wed, 09 Aug 2023 13:35:30 -0400 Study finds no link between alcohol use and breast cancer recurrence or death
研究人员设计了一种益生菌来抑制大脑的自身免疫布里格姆研究人员正在研究一种针对大脑自身免疫的新方法，利用设计细菌使治疗更安全、更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Researchers-design-a-probiotic-to-suppress-autoimmunity-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Researchers-design-a-probiotic-to-suppress-autoimmunity-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=775065bb-7cef-43fb-9682-b24e2c611109 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 13:10:56 -0400 Researchers design a probiotic to suppress autoimmunity in the brain
锻炼应用程序可能成为应对医护人员心理健康危机的主要工具不列颠哥伦比亚大学的新研究表明，使用锻炼应用程序进行简单的家庭锻炼可以有效减少医护人员的抑郁症状，并可能成为应对该行业全球心理健康危机的主要工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Exercise-apps-could-be-a-major-tool-to-combat-mental-health-crisis-among-healthcare-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Exercise-apps-could-be-a-major-tool-to-combat-mental-health-crisis-among-healthcare-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be7e1a75-6d35-46c3-8ed7-98316eb41ecc Wed, 09 Aug 2023 13:01:27 -0400 Exercise apps could be a major tool to combat mental health crisis among healthcare workers
深度学习技术可以帮助科学家开发个性化免疫疗法和疫苗由约翰·霍普金斯大学工程师和癌症研究人员组成的团队开发的深度学习技术可以准确预测可能引发免疫系统反应的癌症相关蛋白质片段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Deep-learning-technology-could-help-scientists-to-develop-personalized-immunotherapies-and-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Deep-learning-technology-could-help-scientists-to-develop-personalized-immunotherapies-and-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91635962-e0ce-4e7b-8401-bc3ad5bffb30 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 12:56:07 -0400 Deep-learning technology could help scientists to develop personalized immunotherapies and vaccines
密歇根大学研究人员因开发突破性外科技术而荣获著名奖项来自密歇根大学工程学院和医学院的一组研究人员发明并开发了组织解剖学，他们将其应用于临床以解决人类疾病的努力为他们赢得了今年的杰出大学创新者奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/UM-researchers-receive-prestigious-award-for-developing-breakthrough-surgical-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/UM-researchers-receive-prestigious-award-for-developing-breakthrough-surgical-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=412d27a1-cf8c-444f-9510-85e9489a79db Wed, 09 Aug 2023 12:26:34 -0400 U-M researchers receive prestigious award for developing breakthrough surgical technology
纽约大学朗格尼分校扩大萨福克县的骨科项目，增加 23 名提供者和 4 家诊所NYU Langone Health 扩大其在长岛屡获殊荣的医疗网络，将其在萨福克县的骨科项目扩大了一倍，增加了 23 家提供者和 4 家诊所，其中包括在石溪的第一个诊所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/NYU-Langone-expands-orthopedic-program-in-Suffolk-County-adds-23-providers-and-4-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/NYU-Langone-expands-orthopedic-program-in-Suffolk-County-adds-23-providers-and-4-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfdc3d5c-cbe7-469b-bc8a-e560fd00af6a Wed, 09 Aug 2023 12:19:37 -0400 NYU Langone expands orthopedic program in Suffolk County, adds 23 providers and 4 practices
当人们了解 FDA 审批流程时，RSV 疫苗推荐率会增加一项新研究发现，如果向怀孕的家庭成员或朋友展示一张概述疫苗获得美国食品和药物管理局批准的严格流程的图表，他们更有可能建议怀孕的家庭成员或朋友接种疫苗，以保护婴儿免受 RSV 疾病的侵害。美国食品药品监督管理局）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/RSV-vaccine-recommendation-rates-increase-when-people-are-informed-about-FDA-approval-process.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/RSV-vaccine-recommendation-rates-increase-when-people-are-informed-about-FDA-approval-process.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6be5bfb9-7b0a-40c4-867d-a54db7b26664 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 10:37:00 -0400 RSV vaccine recommendation rates increase when people are informed about FDA approval process
颗粒物空气污染与全球心血管疾病死亡和残疾增加有关根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》（美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊）上的新研究，颗粒物空气污染对全球死亡和残疾的影响正在上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Penchant-matter-air-pollution-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-death-and-disability-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Penchant-matter-air-pollution-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-death-and-disability-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1d739b3-b3e9-4630-aeeb-74416fb1b74b Wed, 09 Aug 2023 10:31:49 -0400 Particulate matter air pollution linked to increased cardiovascular disease death and disability worldwide
坚持 DASH 饮食对血压有何影响？科学家们研究了控制高血压饮食方法 (DASH) 的坚持程度是否会影响血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/How-does-adherence-to-the-DASH-diet-influence-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/How-does-adherence-to-the-DASH-diet-influence-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83d21dc9-3cc4-4d13-ad2d-957d28b338ff Wed, 09 Aug 2023 09:45:00 -0400 How does adherence to the DASH diet influence blood pressure?
